name: Add new FreeAgent contacts to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new contact is created in FreeAgent, Make will automatically add that contact to a new row in your Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1e-hXFoRZCl0XlzqOA0dmIUJMNBQmhYuuvMvBZpKCxfc/edit?usp=sharing).
